price: 103. Il (Pharaon) voulut les chasser du pays, mais Nous les noyâmes tous ensemble, lui et ceux qui l’accompagnaient.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
